duties_responsibilities.duty: Create personalized shopping experiences for customers to drive brand loyalty.
Model and implement our Service Training Program, greeting customers promptly and courteously.
Operate the cash register, handle money accurately, and check inventory daily.
Maintain a clean and well-organized back-stock area and employee break area.
Promote a positive work environment by recognizing outstanding performance from team members.
Empower team members through communication and recognition.
Maintain knowledge of current trends and styles and respond to problem situations with professionalism.
